Create an MSC file demonstrating all SocialCalc functions organized by categories:
    - Math Functions: ABS, ACOS, ASIN, ATAN, ATAN2, COS, SIN, TAN, SQRT, POWER, etc.
    - Statistics: AVERAGE, COUNT, COUNTA, COUNTBLANK, MAX, MIN, STDEV, VAR, etc.
    - Text Functions: EXACT, FIND, LEFT, RIGHT, MID, LEN, LOWER, UPPER, PROPER, etc.
    - Logical/Test: AND, OR, IF, ISBLANK, ISERR, ISERROR, ISTEXT, TRUE, FALSE, etc.
    - Date & Time: DATE, DAY, MONTH, YEAR, HOUR, MINUTE, SECOND, TODAY, NOW, etc.
    - Lookup: CHOOSE, INDEX, MATCH, VLOOKUP, HLOOKUP
    - Financial: DDB, FV, IRR, NPER, NPV, PMT, PV, RATE, SLN, SYD
    - Other: COLUMNS, ROWS, SUM, SUMIF, COUNTIF

Create a complete Telemedicine Consultation Invoice MSC file with:
    - "TELEMEDICINE CONSULTATION INVOICE" header (digital theme)
    - Telehealth platform name
    - Provider name and specialty (Board certified)
    - Patient information and location
    - Consultation date and time
    - Video call duration
    - Services provided:
      * Telemedicine consultation fee
      * Virtual examination
      * Review of uploaded images/documents
      * Review of home monitoring data (BP, glucose, etc.)
      * Electronic prescription sent
      * Digital health assessment forms
      * Chronic disease management
      * Mental health teletherapy session
      * Follow-up video visit
      * Asynchronous consultation (store-and-forward)
      * Remote patient monitoring services
      * Teledermatology image review
      * Telepsychiatry session
    - Technology fee (platform usage)
    - Medical records transmission
    - After-visit summary provided
    - E-prescription sent to pharmacy
    - Insurance telehealth coverage verification
    - State licensure verification
    - Privacy/HIPAA compliance notice
    - Technical support contact
    - Next virtual appointment scheduled
    - In-person visit recommendation (if needed)
